events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit me well. Please let me know how to get a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to their inquiry about returning a product and receiving their money back.
The case has been assigned to a support agent specialized in refund processing to assist the customer effectively.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you’d like to return the jacket and get a refund. I’m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product was opened or used? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and has only been tried on once. I have all the original tags attached.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days with the tags intact. We will process a full refund once we receive and inspect the item.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I will ship it back today following your instructions.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund successfully. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
Since your refund was completed and there are no further issues reported, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
